title: Loaded Broccoli Totchos
directions: Cook Green Giant Broccoli Veggie Tots™ according to package directions. Arrange cooked Broccoli Veggie Tots™ in 2-quart baking dish. Sprinkle with cheese.
Bake 8 minutes or until cheese is melted.
Top with bacon and green onions and drizzle with dressing.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package Green Giant™ Broccoli Veggie Tots
